Representative Species: Cnidaria, Ctenophora, Scyphozoa; Appendicularia, Thaliacea; Mollusca; Aequorea victoria, Aurelia labiata, Cyanea capillata, Phacellophora camtschatica
Common name: Small hydromedusae, comb jellies, urochordates, larvaceans, pelagic salps, thecosomes and gymnosomes + crystal jelly, moon jelly, lion's mane jelly, fried egg jelly, siphonophore

Representative Species: Skeletonema, Chaetoceros, Thalassiosira, and Coscinodiscus; Coccolithophore
Ciliates, dinoflagellates including Noctiluca, foraminiferans, and radiolarians
Common name: Unicellular heterotrophic protozoans, larval stage of benthic invertebrates, rotifers

Representative Species: Calanus pacificus; Acartia, Pseudocalanus, Paracalanus, and Eucalanus
Chaetognaths, pelagic shrimp (e.g., Sergestidae and Pasiphaeidae), hyperiid amphipods, pelagic larval stages of benthic macroinvertebrates, large predatory copepods, euphausiids
Common name: Chaetognaths, pelagic shrimp (e.g., families Sergestidae and Pasiphaeidae, Caridea), hyperiid amphipods, the pelagic larval stages of benthic macroinvertebrates, and large predatory copepods ; euphausiids
